# UX Productions AB

> Swedish game studio creating handcrafted game experiences since 2013.

## About

UX Productions AB is an independent game development studio based in Mälardalen, Sweden. Founded in 2013, we specialize in creating educational games, classic adventure experiences, and developer tools for Unity.

## What We Do

### Games
We develop games for multiple platforms including Web, iOS, and Android. Our focus is on quality over quantity, creating meaningful and engaging experiences.

### Developer Tools
We create tools and assets for Unity developers, available on the Unity Asset Store. Our tools help other developers build better games faster.

## Contact

- Website: https://uxproductions.se
- Email: info@uxproductions.se
- Location: Mälardalen, Sweden
